mapper.select: select * from paid order by paid_no desc
select * from paid where paid_no=#{board_no} and paid_confirm=1 order by ${paid_date} desc
mapper.insert: insert into paid (board_sub, paid_name, paid_phone, paid_sex, paid_birth, paid_count, paid_kakaoid, paid_date, paid_state, paid_confirm, board_no) values (#{board_sub}, #{paid_name}, #{paid_phone}, #{paid_sex}, #{paid_birth}, #{paid_count}, #{paid_kakaoid}, now(), #{paid_state}, #{paid_confirm}, #{board_no})
